name: God Guides You into VR!
description:
In the beginning, God created polygons and textures. God said "Let there be dynamic lighting!". And so it was rendered. When the boredom of a world without interaction took over, God introduced Man by giving him a Headset and Controllers. And so it was.

God Guides You Into VR is an original and ironic introduction for virtual reality newbies.

Let yourself be guided by this cheerful entity called God in an exciting adventure and explore the physics of his virtual world. Discover for the first time all the potential that Headset and Controller can offer you.

How to play

All you need are your Oculus HMD and controllers

  • Left thumbstick to walk
  • Right thumbstick to (snap) turn the view
  • Grip to grab items

Easy peasy!

Developers

This project has been developed for Virtual Reality course of Politecnico di Torino by

  • Mattia Cacciatore
  • Davide Cetani
  • Federica Giorgione
  • Luca Pauri
  • Matteo Pellegrini
Install instructions

The project has been developed and tested on Oculus/Meta Quest 2 as a PCVR software. Based on feedback, we'll consider trying to build a stand-alone version for Quest/Quest 2.

Once the download is complete, extract the file, connect the headset to your PC and run the file named GodGuidesYouIntoVR.exe.

References
  • Modeling: Blender
  • Game engine: Unity
  • SFX library: freesound
  • Building a Hand Poser for Unity XR
  • Water shader

  • Low poly bat
